name: Sean M Carey
title: Budtender
coverLetter: My name is Sean Carey I’m from Buffalo, Ny I studied communications at the university of Buffalo and graduated from city honors high school one of the top ranking high schools in the nation. I’m a very attentive study and I enjoy every single part of this business and am willing to learn/make any changes needed. I have a vehicle and am extremely reliable.
experience:
Experience- Wiseguys Pizza, August 2008- January 2014, Owner-Jason Seefldt, Position- Manager/Driver, Reason for Leaving- looking for work in a new area


Contact Information- Cell Phone# 716-390-1714, email- seancare5634@gmail.com, Address- 2387 Seneca St. Buffalo,NY, 14210


Conclusion- I'd like to thank you for your time and the opportunity, if you contact me I can promise I will be a long time reliable employee. Also, training will not be a challenge I catch on quickly and take pride in my work.

I honestly feel like we could be a good fit for each other if given the chance.


Thank You,

Sean M. Carey
